long_description: With its pliable shape, speed and accuracy, the West Paw Zisc flying disc will make your dog's day! Soft, durable Zogoflex(R) material makes it easy to pick up from a flat surface and won't hurt your dog's sensitive mouth. Great for playing fetch at the park, in the back yard or along the beach-it floats! Assorted colors.
short_description: With its pliable shape, speed and accuracy, the West Paw Zisc flying disc will make your dog's day!
